definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: bring out, furnish, promote (NH id.; appar. akin to Aram. [[נְפַק]] go forth, Aph. bring forth, produce);—
produce, furnish: Impf. (juss.) [[וְתָפֵק לָרָעֵב]] Is 58:10 c. [[נַפְשְְׁ]] (rd. perh. [[לַחְמְְ]] v. Che:Hpt); Pt. [[מְפִיקִים]] [[מִזַּן אֶל־זַן]] Ps 144:13 (v. [[זַן]]).
bring out, elicit, obtain, c. acc.; [[יׇפִיק]] Pr 3:13, + [[מִן]] pers., [[וַיׇּפֶק]] Pr 8:35, Pr 18:22 (all ‖[[מחא]]), Pr 12:2.
[[זְמָמוֹ אַל־תָּפֵק]] Ps 140:9 his device do not promote.
